Description: 
------------------ 
ExerBeat offers an interactive fitness experience that players will practice the rhythm and use the Wii Remote to perform more than 150 activities, all simple but demanding. 
With a number of options, personal trainers in the game, personalized exercise programs, and all necessary information about calories burned, ExerBeat virtual environment offers a harsh physical work without leaving home
